thread.title: Sukhbir meddling in SGPC affairs: MLA
thread.title_full: Sukhbir meddling in SGPC affairs: MLA

author: tribuneindia.com
title: Sukhbir meddling in SGPC affairs: MLA
text: Chandigarh: The Punjab Congress has questioned the Shiromani Akali Dal chief Sukhbir Badal for holding a meeting of SGPC members at his residence and asked him to explain under which capacity he is interfering in the Shiromani Gurdwara Parbandhak Committee’s affairs. Senior Congress leader Sukhjinder Randhawa, in a press statement issued here on Sunday, said the SGPC was an institution which represented all Sikhs having different political and social alignments. Sukhbir this had no right to call a meeting of SGPC members. “The SGPC doesn’t represent the Shiromani Akali Dal, but the Sikhs in general,” said the Congress MLA.
